price: And that He – our exalted and glorified Lord[1] – has neither taken a wife nor a child;
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةٗ وَلَا وَلَدٗا
footnotes: [1] “Jadd” of Our Lord means His Glory, Grandeur, and Command.
